Description: BJ's Wholesale Club, Inc., based in Natick, Mass., paid $320,000 in back wages to 233 employees for uncompensated overtime work revealed during a U.S. Department of Labor investigation.
Agency: Labor Department Wage and Hour Division
Info Source: https://www.dol.gov/whd/media/press/whdpressVB2.asp?pressdoc=Northeast/NEarchive/20041331.xml
